feat: Redesign Venues Directory UI with reusable components

- Create 5 new reusable venue components for better UX:
  - VenueContactCard: Structured contact display with icons and tooltips
  - VenueFacilitiesDisplay: Badge group with tooltip for overflow facilities
  - VenueCapacityDisplay: Clear capacity + parking display
  - VenueCostDisplay: Pricing tiers with color-coded rates
  - VenueInfoSummary: Compact venue name + location summary

- Decompress table layout from 8 to 6 columns:
  - Combine Capacity + Facilities into "Details" column
  - Move Status badge into Venue column
  - Add vertical padding (py-2) and minimum widths for breathing room
  - Increase columnWidthEstimate from 160px to 200px

- Improve mobile LocationCard with new components

- Better empty states: "Contact for pricing" instead of "No cost set"

- Enhanced responsive column visibility for better mobile experience
EOF
)")
